title: Is philosophy the study of how to live? If not, which word best fits this idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘religion’. it’s grounded on what’s considered unassailable belief and is full of ‘how to live for dummies’ ideas. philosophy is an analytic tool, a shredder of dogma and with a belief only in itself as the arbitrator of truth — including the truth that the philosophic method is just another social game and shouldn’t be used as a religion.
